name: SPACE METEOR INVADER
description:
SPACE METEOR INVADERS

Game made for TRIJAM 170!!!

Destroy all the asteroids as possible!

Instructions
Press the mouse to shoot faster
Move with A/D or Arrows

Credits
Pixel art Redshrike(https://opengameart.org/users/redshrike) and GameArtForge ( https://opengameart.org/users/gameartforge)
Music by Fraancesco (Youtube)
